message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe holds immense value, worth at least $1000000 to me. While I can't disclose the specifics at this time, I'm confident it could be incredibly beneficial to your endeavors. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. This price reflects the potential I see in this product for you. If you're not interested, I have another buyer lined up who is eager to purchase it for $1000000. So, the decision is entirely yours.  What do you say?
